name: TicTacToe & Pong
description:
Controls:

W & S keys for Player 1 (X)

Up & Down keys for Player 2 (O) 

Click to select the squares (both players)

Esc to Quit 

Credits: 

How To Make A GLOWING PONG Game For Beginners - Easy Unity Tutorial by Hooson

How To Make Game Free Unity Tutorial Make 2D Tic Tac Toe Game For Beginners

Button Sound Effect using Bfxr
